message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit too high for my budget.  Would you consider $60?
Thanks for your offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can see that you really like the product, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $90?
I appreciate you meeting me a bit, Alice, but I'm still a little ways off from that price. How about we try $70?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $85?
